string-array.name: NormQuotes
string-array.item:
And he was standing there, reading one of those big books. 

You know the kind. Usually you can’t even understand their stupid titles, and when you try to read them you get one word in and get really sleepy. 

And it’s so stupid to try anyway, because if the stupid book is any good they’ll make a TV movie out of it and then you can watch that instead

And you’d correct him, but the thing is, you’re not sure you remember it a hundred percent accurately yourself. 

It turns out your memory isn’t the precise court stenographer you think it is, getting every word down just so. 

It’s more like the sketch artist way at the back of the courtroom who is doing his level best to capture images that no longer are.
As Adolf Hitler once said, all publicity is good publicity.

Before I was famous I had a whole bunch of jobs where all I needed was boots. 

People would look right past me, or if they did look at me, it was with a mean look. 

But when I got famous, people would look at me and smile and wonder where they knew me from. 

If they flat-out recognized me, they'd laugh and dance like they'd won a prize, and I'd just stand there and smile and feel warmth from their love. So the fame made the world, which is a real cold place, a little less cold.
Death is a funny thing. \n\nNot funny haha, like a Woody Allen movie, but funny strange, like a Woody Allen marriage.

Earlier this week, Marlon Brando met with Jewish leaders to apologize for comments he made on Larry King Live, among them that "Hollywood is run by Jews". \n\nThe Jewish leaders accepted the actor’s apology and announced that Brando is now free to work again.
I hate when people say \"touché\" after you say something funny. \n\nI don’t know what it means, but I know that I hate it.
I\'ll admit that I\'m deeply closeted, but I\'ll never admit that I\'m gay.
Long after I left the segment, the term "fake news" became the ordinary way to describe what was done on SNL as well as The Daily Show and The Colbert Report. \n\nSo who’s the idiot now?
Now that all hope is gone, a deep relief has taken its place, and I allow myself to enjoy it before the despair sets in.

On the final night, Adam Sandler told me the following season would be a rough, divisive one, and he wanted to know which side I’d take. \n\nI told him I wanted to be on the side of the guy who had shoved the baby tomatoes up his ass. Adam smiled.

She said she could no longer live in New York, that she was being tormented day and night by some obsessive stalker. \n\nThis caught me completely by surprise, as I had taken to hanging around Sarah’s apartment, hiding in the bushes day and night, watching her come and go, and I had never seen any signs of a stalker.
Sometimes a writer\'s strike is good. \n\nMaybe if we had a writer\'s strike now, people would have to read Shakespeare instead of James Patterson.
The only time having a cult following is a great thing is when you are actually in a cult.

The plain truth is that Adam Eget is an alcoholic and that’s why he doesn’t drink. 

Me, I’m not an alcoholic and that’s why I do drink. 

Life sure is funny that way.

Well, the results are in, and once again Microsoft CEO Bill Gates is the richest man in America. \n\nGates says he is grateful for his huge financial success, but it still makes him sad when he looks around and sees other people with any money whatsoever.

When I was right beside Ben Matlock, I threw the Archie comic away and grabbed the biggest, thickest book I could find and turned to a random page. \n\nThen I loudly said, "What the fuck? I certainly didn’t see that shit coming. Ben Matlock turned his back to me.

Women are attracted to funny men, it is often said. 

This is not true. 

It only appears this way because women laugh at everything a very handsome man says. So this gives the very handsome men the idea that they are funny.

Compared to politics, I think sports is funnier, because it's inconsequential. And politics can be real important and all that. 

The more pointless something is, the funnier it is, you know? And the more grave or important things are… 

You know, some comedians can get this disease where they get serious all the time.
I always told everybody the perfect joke would be where the setup and punch line were identical.
I don\'t know the difference between a hippie and a hipster \n\nbut, it\'s fun to watch either one of them get beat up.
I think clever people think that poor people are stupid.
Note to self: \n\nno matter how bad life gets, there\'s always beer.

OJ Simpson was in a different kind of courtroom this week attempting to regain custody of his two children. 

In order to prove to the court how much he loves his kids, OJ pointed out 

quote: 'Hey, they're still alive, aren't they?'
Our passions may be compared to certain slaves—\n\nthe more severity we show them, the better they obey us.
When I hear a guy lost a battle to cancer, that really did bother me, that that\'s a term. \n\nIt implies that he failed and that somebody else that defeated cancer is heroic and courageous.
I once walked in on my parents having sex. \n\nIt was the most embarrassing thirty minutes of my life.
You know, with Hitler, the more I learn about that guy, the more I don\'t care for him.
They\'re like \'\'You\'re an alcoholic.\'\' I go \'\'No, I\'m not.\'\' \n\nAnd then apparently that\'s what alcoholics say too, you know?
Chess players think checker players are dumb. \n\nBut I love playing checkers. Plus, the red ones are tasty.
Many people are skeptical about marriage of Michael Jackson and Lisa Marie Presley. \n\nThey say, Lisa Marie is more of a sit-at-home type, while Michael Jackson is more of a homosexual pedophile
They say that if you\'re afraid of homosexuals, it means that deep down inside you\'re actually a homosexual yourself. \n\nThat worries me because I\'m afraid of dogs
When Mozart would sit down and compose a new piano concerto, he’d first pause, close his eyes, and say to himself, \n\n\"I better make this as hard as f*ck to play.\"

You ever lie for no reason at all? Just all of sudden, a big lie spills out of your evil head. 

Like a guy will come up to you, "Hey, did you ever see that movie with Meryl Streep and a horse?" And you go, "Yes." 

In the back of your head, you're like, "What in the hell am I lying about over here? I stand to gain nothing by this lie."

I just got back from New York. You ever been there? 

There was a big gay parade going on there when I was there, and I never been to one of them, and I like a parade. I always like a parade. 

So, I go there, and it turns out, it's just a bunch of gay guys
I don’t want fancy things. I don’t want fancy, smancy things. I don’t even want fancy, smancy, wancy things. \n\nWhat I want is to waste your time
I wouldn\'t call myself a fan of Steampunk. \n\nBut I will say, its the healthiest way to prepare punk.
I\'m not gay, so I don\'t know much about Broadway musicals

Man, them engagement rings, boy, they cost a lot. I was looking at \'em. Cost like a thousand bucks, two thousand bucks, y\'know. Three thousand bucks. Something like that, four thousand bucks. \n\nBig number divisible by a thousand, anyways.

All kinds of violence on the TV. You're not supposed to watch violence on the TV. 

Children, they can't watch it 'cause they're afraid maybe the kids will copy something they see on the TV. 

I can't even get a funny cartoon anymore because some 12-year-old somewhere watched a particularly violent episode of the Road Runner-Coyote show, and the next day, they found him at the bottom of a canyon, two giant springs strapped to his feet.

I don’t do much. I’m too lazy. That’s my problem. Hang around my couch, watching the TV. Just too lazy. 

I realized this the other day, I get hit my a truck tomorrow - a big truck could hit me - paralyze me from the neck down. 

Wouldn’t affect my lifestyle a bit really.

He has the disease of alcoholism. 

And he came to me and he told me, and I'm the kind of guy that likes to look at the bright side of things. 

So I told him, I said, "Richie, it's true that you have a disease and everything, but I think you got the best one."

My wife dresses up like a nurse; then, I dress up like a nurse, also. And then, we don\'t even have sex, either. \n\nWe just sit behind this huge, semicircular wooden desk and get annoyed when people buzz us for juice.

I went to a hypnotist. He put me under a spell, and every time I had a craving for a cigarette, I would throw up. 

It's very embarrassing right after sex. 

I find it pretty hard to get that second date after that. Girls get all snobby after you barf on them.
I don’t care for sex. I find it an embarrassing, dull exercise. \n\nI prefer sports, where you can win.

Sex couldn't be simpler. I think there's only like five things you can do in the whole f*cking thing. 

You ever think you invented a sixth? 

Then later you go, "Ah, in all humility, I guess that was pretty close to number five."
Comedy is surprises, so if you\'re intending to make somebody laugh and they don’t laugh, that’s funny.

This is the amount of time you think about sex: every once in a while. 

The problem becomes, when you think about it, it's all you can think about. It encompasses your whole brain. 

You're like a f*cking werewolf or something. Usually you're a civilized human being, but then every couple of days, you're like "Arrrgh." Then you've got to close the blinds.

I quit smoking and nothing much is different. Except I can taste my food. 

I went to a friend's place for dinner and I was like… 

What's this zingy, zangy thing you're serving me here? Never tasted anything so zingy and zangy. 

… A boiled potato, eh? Huh.

A man's wife goes into a coma. The doctor says "There is only one way of reviving your wife but it's a little unconventional. 

You go in there and have oral sex with her" 

The man says"my god...." Doctor says "I know I know, but I've seen it work" The man says "OK doc, I'll try anything, I'm desperate" 

He goes into his wifes room, closes the door behind him. He comes out five minutes later and says"Doc, I don't think it's working....she's choking"
I endorse podiums \n\nThat’s a product I can stand behind!
They call gambling a disease, but it’s the only disease where you can win a bunch of money.
I feel bad for the homeless guy, but I feel really bad the homeless guy\'s dog, because he must be thinking \n\n\'Man, this is the longest walk ever"

The other day I found a baby bird that had fallen out of its nest. 

I love animals, and I thought to myself 'I'm going to get this little guy back to its nest'. 

Now, it took me about 5 or 6 throws…
The other day I tell my wife, "when I look into the mirror I only see an old fat man, I need you to make me feel better about myself." \n\nShe says "you have perfect eyesight."
ID is a funny abbreviation. The I stands for I and D strands for dentification.
What is the last thing you want to hear after blowing Willie Nelson? \n\n\'I\'m not Willie Nelson\'
When I was a child they told me, "The children are our future." \'Now that I\'m grown, they\'re saying it\'s actually these new children. \n\nI know a Ponzi scheme when I see one.

I saw a pig, a cow, and a horse. 

I told my wife, “Those look like some of your relatives. 

She replied, “Yeah, my in-laws!”
The city of Las Vegas now has a gigantic ferris wheel that is drawing huge crowds. \n\nAlso drawing thousands to Las Vegas…whores!
Before I met my wife, I always felt incomplete. \n\nNow I\'m finished.
I feel the same way about slaves as I do shirts with flame patterns on them. \n\nI don\'t want to be friends with anyone who owns either of them
Regarding the war on terror… Fighting it in the Middle East seems a little crazy. \n\nI would\'ve started with our nation\'s haunted houses.
When you\'re single and trying to attract a partner, it\'s important to project the qualities you desire… which I understand, \n\nbut boy-oh-boy have I had to suck a lot of dick lately…
Yesterday I had a picture framed, \n\nnow it\'s doing time upstate for armed robbery.
I need to have glasses to see my family. \n\nSpecifically, two glasses… of scotch!
I saw my little nephew and he asked me "where would be the worst place to get a bug-bite". \n\nI thought about it and said \'Maybe the eye? Where do you think?\' and he said \'Brazil\'.
I signed up for my company\'s 401k \n\nbut I don\'t think I can run that far.
If I was grading constellations, my review and description for Orion\'s Belt would be just three stars.
My girlfriend\'s mad at me right now. \n\nLast night during sex I yelled the name of her ex-boyfriend.
I know I\'m not the most attractive man in the world, \n\nwhen women look at me I can tell they\'re over-dressing me with their eyes.
I was raised in a broken home, \n\nmy father was a drunk carpenter.
I had a wild night last night, \n\nI was in an orgy. It was me, my iPad, my laptop and my TV while my phone watched.
I\'ve never been on top of the latest trends. \n\nWhen everyone was burning CDs I was still burning books.

A friend of mine said that his biggest fear is that ISIS or some terrorist group like that will get hold of a dirty bomb and explode it over a major city within the United States and kill tens of millions of people… \n\n…because then the blowback against innocent muslims would be absolutely terrible.
Crowds in Brazil greeted arriving Olympians with signs reading \'Welcome to Hell\'. \n\nTheir local Chamber of Commerce really needs to brush up on the basics.
There\'s no hard evidence that flossing helps your teeth much, scientists now say, \n\nthough they add that it is a great activity for people who enjoy tedious repetitious drudgery.
A heatwave striking in New York has caused horse manure to spontaneously combust, \n\nso for the first time in history you can explain why New York City smells like a flaming pile of horseshit.
Last week Pope Francis paid a sombre visit to Auschwitz which surprised me because I thought he was one of those fun ghosts.
The Blue Man Group has been forced by the federal government to hire an orange man and a purple woman.
A new report by the CDC reports that only one third of Americans use condoms while two thirds are still pretty cool.
Ever since Trump\'s new immigration policy came in, the band \'Foreigner\' is scared.
They say curiosity killed the cat but \n\nI don\'t think we should rule out that shifty-lookin\' kid next door…
Something tells me a \'cock-and-bull story\' has a different meaning at a gay rodeo.

You know I'm happy to help out a friend, 

but the next time my roommate asks for help putting on sunscreen, he better be talking about his back. 

Fool me once!
You know what\'s not as easy as pie? \n\nBaking an actual fucking pie!
There\'s no use crying over spilt milk, \n\nunless the milk was spilt on your father\'s fresh corpse right before his funeral.

When I grew up, my family was so poor we didn\'t have a pot to piss in, so we pissed in other people\'s pots. \n\nWe\'d break into people\'s houses in the dead of night, find people\'s pots and take a giant piss in them because we had accumulated full bladders from holding down urine all day long from waiting to piss in people\'s pots.
I don\'t want to shoot myself in the foot but my left big toe is a neo-nazi. \n\nEven worse, my big right toe believes that there should be a gender pay gap.
A group of crows is called a murder, a group of unicorns is called a blessing and a group of cows is called my in-laws!
A hippo\'s mouth is wide enough to fit a four foot tall child, \n\nunfortunately after measuring the hippo\'s mouth, almost all the children were eaten.
Look, I know the bible says not to covet thy neighbour\'s wife, \n\nbut it doesn\'t say a damn thing about not coveting thy neighbour\'s husband, especially his sweet hot fuckin\' asshole.
The Statue of Liberty is setting a bad example for young women. \n\nWhen times get tough, you can\'t just stand motionless for centuries holding a torch.
Artifacts from Auschwitz are set to go on tour for the first time. \n\nExperts believe this will be Miley Cyrus\' darkest opening act yet.
A new study finds that men are more likely to blame \'stress from work\' as the contributor to poor mental health \n\nwhile women are more likely to jabber on about something or other.
They announced there\'s going to be another Twilight movie and the little girl inside me is really excited.

I made a bad business decision, I started an online business, 

you know what I sold? 

Brick & Mortar.
I may not have book smarts, but you know what I do have? \n\nSupermarket flyer smarts!
How do you get a tissue to dance? \n\nYou put a little boogie in it.
Roses are gray, Violets are gray, Tulips are gray, \n\nBecause I\'m a dog.
Call me old fashioned, but I long for the days when wives stayed at home and only cost three goats.
I was once trapped on a desert island and to be honest, the five albums I brought didn\'t help a goddamn thing.
I don\'t want fancy things. Or fancy-shmancy things. I don\'t even want fancy-shmancy-wancy things or fancy-shmancy-take-a-trip-to-Francey things! What I want is wasting your time and mine.
A lot of people are excited for self-driving cars and so am I. \n\nFinally, I\'ll feel what it\'s like to kill without having any personal responsibility.
If you can’t handle me when I’m covered in the blood of a boar I’ve just sacrificed to the Gods, \n\nthen you don’t deserve me during the bountiful harvest that will result.
Male authors are obsessed with female bodies, going on and on about webbed feet and soft insulat- \n\noh I\'m sorry, that\'s male OTTERS.
I can\'t stand stuck-up bodies of water. \n\nIt\'s like, \'Get over yourself, Lake Superior\'
Let\'s be honest, most people you see going skinny dipping are actually just going dipping.
If I could add one president to Mt. Rushmore it would be James Polk, \n\nbecause I\'m interested to know what he looked like.
I\'ve been jogging for a few months and I recently set a new record for a 5-mile run: \n\n3 miles.
To me perfect sex is like a carwash: \n\nYou start by lining up right and going in slow and you finish when three Mexican dudes run up and furiously towel you off.
A storm picked up eggs and milk over the Rockies and is now battering the Midwest.
Now I ain\'t saying she\'s a gold digger, but she does have several shovels, picks and panning sluices strapped to her burro.
If you\'re one of those people that complains that CVS receipts are too long, \n\nyou\'re going to fucking hate books.
Wearing glasses doesn\'t always make you look smarter. \n\nFor example, you must wear them on your face.
Take everything you know about bread and throw it out the window… \n\nNow, let me tell you about this invention I made: Bread
Hey, who\'s this graffiti artist who draws chalk outlines of people in the bad parts of town? \n\nI don\'t like \'em!
If you\'re sitting around with your thumb up your ass, \n\nhow could you possibly think you were doing nothing. It just doesn\'t make sense.
Prison rapes are delicious. \n\nOh, wait, I\'m sorry, prison crêpes.
The inside of the human body is more of a miracle than you\'d first think \n\nsince everything goes on in there in total darkness.
A lot of people stress out about getting crows\' feet, \n\nbut personally I would be more concerned about their long, razor-sharp beaks.
Boy… how my mom worked all day, cared for me, put food on the table, \n\nand killed all those drifters is really something.
The most disturbing thing about Disneyland is seeing all those smiling people walking around wearing Mickey Mouse\'s severed scalp.
When Mozart would sit down to compose a new piano concerto, he would first pause, close his eyes, and say to himself, \n\n"I\'d better make this hard as fuck to play"
I wonder who\'s buried in the grave of the guy who invented the Ol\' Switcheroo.
I don\'t fat-shame women because you can\'t judge a book by it\'s cover. \n\nOf course, if it\'s too damn thick, no-one\'s going to read it.
Bad news for e-cigarette users: \n\nYou look fuckin\' stupid.
Words cannot describe your beauty, Adam Eget. \n\nBut numbers can. You\'re a 4.
A bird in the hand is a good way to get bird flu, you fuckin\' asshole. \n\nGet away from me, go wash your fuckin\' hand!
Nobody tells me what I can or can\'t eat, \n\nleast of all some guy who\'s job is labelling packets of silica gel.
We all know that the Swiss are officially neutral. \n\nUnofficially, however, they\'re filthy sons of bitches.
Remember the old days when \'tweeting\' meant stabbing a hooker?
I can prove God exists! \n\nIf I could just find that damn receipt from our brunch in heaven…
We could nip \'March Madness\' in the bud if we watch for the warning signs of \'Brooding Anti-social February Fever\'
This Lindsay Lohan can\'t swim a stroke but she sure knows every dive in town.
Call me an old softie, \n\nbut I\'d prefer if you call me a distinguished gentleman with a flagging erection.
I remember back when the \'Harlem Shake\' was just a black fella holding me upside down off of a fire escape trying to collect his money!
Deep Throat\' porn legend Harry Reems died. \n\nHow are they going to close that casket?!
Alfred the Great may well be the greatest monarch in the history of England. \n\nThe worst? Richard the Goat Fucker!
Hank Williams Jr. called President Obama a Muslim who "hates the US" \n\nIn response, President Obama said, "Why would I hate the US? You guys made me President and I wasn\'t even born here!"
This Easter Sunday, Snoop Dogg gets to say \n\n"Christ is Rizzisen"
We wear new clothes on Easter to represent Christ\'s triumphant appearance to the stunned Apostles in a sharp 2-button blazer by Hugo Boss.
The guy who did the voice of Charlie Brown was arrested for stalking his girlfriend this week. \n\nHe also said the next time Lucy grabs away the football, he\'s going to "cut that bitch".
Some folks say what this country needs is a good five cent cigar. \n\nI\'m guessing they\'re opposing Obamacare.
I don\'t know if this counts as an NCAA Cinderella story, \n\nbut one of the Marquette players said he had help making his uniform from a bunch of singing mice and birds.
Warning to the Easter bunny: \n\nDon\'t put all your eggs in one basket, fella!
They say the world\'s a smaller place than it used to be, \n\nbut I think that\'s an optical illusion, based on me becoming a big fat guy.
Growing up, I never would have believed that one day I\'d need a computer just to masturbate.

Swedish Bond girl Britt Ekland told Piers Morgan this week that she was seduced by Warren Beatty after the legendary lothario took her to an X-rated movie for their first date. \n\nThis is what I have to say about that: "Hey Warren, stop stealing my moves!"
Thomas Edison invented the lightbulb, \n\nbut I invented the lightbulb up my ass.
Octomom is facing jail time for committing welfare fraud. \n\nWho didn\'t see that one coming. I mean seriously, a single mother of eight!
I am not a big fan of videogames where you cannot kill a prostitute.

I love Lou Gehrig, 

but I'm not going to stand up in front of a million people and brag that I'm the luckiest man in the world because some doctors named a disease after me. 

Confidence is one thing, but arrogance is the worst disease of them all.
One day in the hopefully not-too-distant future, North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un is going to hear a loud popping sound. \n\nThe sound of his head coming out of his own ass!

A Miami Florida pimp is in custody after forcing a 13 year old prostitute to have his name tattooed on her eyelids when she threatened to run away from him. 

Roman Thomas III faces charges of human trafficking, false imprisonment, lewd and lascivious exhibition, and delivery of a controlled substance to a child. Y'know, 

I know the scriptures say "judge not lest ye be judged" but I'm just going to come right out and say it. This 'Roman Thomas III guy'… this guy's a real jerk!
I used to think revenge was a dish best served cold, \n\nbut then I realized it meant \'getting back at somebody\'.

Hey, news media, leave Kim Kardashian alone, will you? She\'s pregnant! Of course she\'s going to gain weight, and if anyone knows about rapid weight gain it\'s me. \n\nI went to see the doctor about it and he told me to open my mouth and say OINK!
I think enough time has passed since 1947 where I can safely admit it. \n\nI wish I was the guy that finally wiped the annoying smirk off the Black Dahlia\'s face.
Music is the universal language, but one day soon it will be replaced by Chinese.
Mickey Mantle knew two things, drinking, and playing drunk baseball.
Why doesn\'t Applebee\'s call their appetizers appletizers? \n\nAnd why doesn\'t that waitress I met at TGI Fridays ever call me back?
This administration is cutting back drastically on military spending but doesn\'t think defense capabilities will be comprised? \n\nHow so? I\'ll tell you how so! Groupons! Remember Groupons?
A worldwide scientific study confirms a long held suspicion; \n\nno one anywhere likes drum circles.
Justin Bieber\'s monkey has been quarantined, \n\nwhich reminds us how far we\'ve come since headlines about Pearl Harbor and D-Day.
In the coffee shop line today I hear the guy behind me say "I like to start by biting the ears off" \n\nand I had to pray "Please God, let him be talking about a chocolate Easter bunny!"

Earlier this week Aaron Jackson of Topeka, Kansas painted his house the colors of the gay pride rainbow flag in direct protest of the Westboro Baptist Church. \n\nWhen that didn\'t seem to work, Jackson fucked three of his best buds on his front lawn.

Chipotle has cancelled its planned sponsorship of the Utah Boy Scout event due to the BSA\'s ban on gay leaders and scouts. \n\nIronic how an all male anti-gay organization would want to put hot thick loads of beef and sour cream in their mouth.

Former Tennessee Titans cheerleader Elizabeth Leigh Garner, 42 is accused of pulling a 12 year old boy pants off and offering him oral sex. 

The boy refused her advances, 

not because he was 12 but because he was a diehard Colts fan.
The obituaries are concerning me because people are dying in alphabetical order.
Former pornstar Jenna Jameson was arrested this weekend after allegedly assaulting someone. \n\nThis may be the most damaging to happen to her image since her 16 year career in pornography.
Why did the moron throw the clock out the window? \n\nBecause it reminded him of Richard Clock - the man convicted of knife-raping his wife.
Veterinarians in Colorado have reported that marijuana use is on the rise among dogs. \n\nThey say you will know if your dog is too high if it starts making a really tall sandwich.
My doctor told me I should start juicing. The problem is I don\'t think he meant ham juice.
I\'m so fat that when I get my shoes shined I have to take the bootblack\'s word for it!
Porn actor Ron Jeremy is back at work after having open-heart surgery. \n\nThe name of his next feature is called \'I\'m Going to Have to Sit Down for Most of This\'
Dance like no one is watching. Sing like no one is listening. Love like you\'ve never been hurt. \n\nAnd fuck like a goddamn retard.

How many Polish guys does it take to screw in a lightbulb. \n\nThe question can not be answered because Polish people are so fucking stupid that no matter how many of them are available none of them would ever be able to complete that simple task.

How many comedians does it take to screw in a lightbulb? 

Two. 

One to do it, and the other to go "How long's he been up there?"

Have you heard about the four NFL players that are coming out of the closet? 

It's about time I think. I think it's high time. 

Because isn't it strange that nobody's come out of closet in the entire sport of football? Where there's 2000+ players? So there's a great deal of speculation on who those four openly gay players will be. Nobody knows. My guess is it's those four that are always sucking each others cocks.
Because of droughts all over Europe, scientists are predicting a global shortage of olive oil. \n\nSoon the world will know how Popeye felt after the death of his wife.
It takes forever to get a pilot\'s license, \n\nbut it only takes a couple of minutes to steal a pilot\'s jacket and hat.

Barbara Walters is planning to announce her retirement, 

what's next for Babs? 

Death.
I think there\'s nothing cooler than being a lone wolf. \n\nExcept at wolf-picnics when you don\'t have a partner for the wolf-wheelbarrow races.
Call me crazy, but I take orders from Martians who send secret messages beamed out from the antenna at the top of the Empire State Building.
A Georgia high school is planning to merge their formerly all black and all white proms into a single event. \n\nThe theme of this June\'s dance? \'An Evening of Unbridled Race War\'
A Florida man was arrested for stealing a truck filled with $76,000 worth of Campbell\'s soup. \n\nI, for one, hope this guy goes away for \'Mmm, mmm, good!\'
My girlfriend and I have a deal where we have one celebrity that we can sleep with and it\'s not considered cheating. \n\nMine is that woman who plays Madea.

In Kansas, a gay-rights activist named Aaron Jackson paid $83,000 to buy a house across from the homophobic Westboro Baptist Church and had it painted rainbow colours. 

Mr. Jackson plans to recoup his investment by… 

well, actually there's no plan. 

Have fun living in a hideous house in Kansas across from some vicious bigots!
Its Earth Day! The one day of the year where you can jerk off outside and nothing bad can happen! \n\n(I don\'t know what Earth Day is)
A new study shows that most men can identify a gay man by his face alone. \n\nIt\'s the face that\'s buried in another man\'s asshole.

Apparently someone in Germany stole 5 metric tons of Nutella. \n\nPolice haven\'t arrested anyone yet but they are questioning Günther Hasbargen, the 700 pound man that smells like chocolate and hazelnuts who guards the Nutella storage facility.
I love the movie \'42\'. \n\nIt\'s Chadwick Boseman like you\'ve never seen him before!
There\'s no wrong way to eat a Reese\'s… \n\nsays the guy who didn\'t shove a bunch of Reese\'s up his ass.
Amanda Bynes is a lush blonde who\'s quickly turning into a blonde lush.
